alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 11 at 3:05AM MST until March 11 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains and Flat Tops. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops
